sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; const AboutUs = () => { return (

About ARMS Portal

{/* What is ARMS? */}

ARMS (Academic Resource Management System) is a centralized digital platform built to serve students, teachers, and university admins. It acts as a reliable repository for key academic materials across institutions.

  • Notes: Department-wise and semester-wise in downloadable formats
  • Syllabus: Constantly updated with course revisions
  • Question Papers: Past exams categorized by university and year

With ARMS, students and faculty can collaborate, access, and manage academic content effortlessly and securely.

{/* Who Benefits */}

Who Benefits from ARMS?

  • Students: Search and download learning material instantly
  • Faculty: Upload and manage notes, syllabi, and papers
  • Admins: Control platform content, university profiles, and resources
{/* Mission */}

🎯 Our Mission

Our goal is to make academic content universally accessible by bringing all university resources onto one intuitive, easy-to-use platform. We believe in empowering learners and educators through transparency, organization, and open knowledge-sharing.

); }; export default AboutUs;
